activities: Contegix manages data received from the EU in two ways.  First, our sales and account information received from customers and prospects located in the EU is stored to assist in our sales and account management processes.  Second, because we are a hosting company, many of our clients store data on their servers that originates from the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
privacyprograms: Contegix is certified through TRUSTe under their Safe Harbor program.
recoursemech: Contegix uses TRUSTe's dispute resolution services.  Per our privacy policy, visitors may email Contegix directly at compliance@contegix.com, or may use the TRUSTe complaint form at http://watchdog.truste.com/pvr.php?page=complaint&url=.
